Performances > September 1979: Masakiyo's Loyalty

– Click image to view.

September 1979: Masakiyo's Loyalty

Plays:

Masakiyo's Loyalty (八陣守護城)

Scenes:

In Front of the Gate (門前)

The Poisoned Sake (毒酒)

The Port of Naniwa (浪花入江)

Kazuenosuke's Urgent Call (主計之介早討)

Masakiyo's Castle (正清本城)

Characters:

Masakiyo Kato (加藤肥多守正清)

Yoshinari Mori (森三左衛門義成)

Hayase, a maid (腰元早瀬)

Saeda, a maid (腰元左枝)

Hinaginu (娘雛絹)

Gemba Marikawa (鞠川玄蕃)

Shigarami (妻柵)

Kazuenosuke Kato (加藤主計之介清郷)

Tokimasa Hojo (北条時政)

Imperial messenger (山蔭中納言)

Kyuma Hayabuchi (早淵久馬)

Spy (忍び)

Teruha, a maid (腰元照葉)

Miyuki, a maid (腰元深雪)

Yoshihiro Ouchi (大内冠者義弘)

Hazue (奥方葉末)

Nadaemon, in fact Motobei Kojima (船頭灘右衛門実は児嶋元兵衛政次)
